gameselect_description_HowlingAbyss: Fight as a team of five randomly selected champions to siege the bridge and capture the enemy Nexus.
gameselect_description_SummonersRift: The oldest and most venerated Field of Justice is known as Summoner's Rift. The Rift is located in a remote forest between Frejlord, the Serpentine River, and the Ironspike Mountains.
gameselect_description_TwistedTreeline: A brief description of Twisted Treeline.

lobby_party_rewards_partied_tooltip_desc: By playing with friends, you earn Party Rewards! More friends means more loot, so team up!
lobby_party_rewards_tooltip_description: Earn IP rewards by playing with friends. More friends means more loot!

mastery_page_add_page_error_text: Failed to create a mastery page on server. It may be a connection issue.
mastery_page_delete_confirm: Are you sure that you want to delete this page?
mastery_page_save_button_tooltip: Click to save all changes to your mastery pages.
mastery_page_save_error_text: Failed to save mastery pages due to network failure.
mastery_page_unsaved_confirm: You have unsaved changes to your masteries. Do you want to save?
patcher_connection_error: There is a problem with your connection. If you are not currently connected to the internet, please do so. If you are already on-line but cannot connect to League of Legends, check our support page to find possible solutions.
patcher_connection_error_content: There is a problem with your connection. If you are not currently connected to the internet, please do so. If you are already on-line but cannot connect to League of Legends, check our support page to find possible solutions.
patcher_did_restore_client_backup_conten: We have restored an older version of League of Legends. Now, we'll try to patch it up to the latest version.
patcher_error_broken_permissions_content: The file permissions in your installation directory are preventing League from installing. Please press 'Okay' and we will attempt prompt your operating system's permissions' manager.
patcher_error_connection_content: There is a problem connecting to the server. Please check your internet connection and restart the patcher. If your internet connectivity isn't the issue, please follow the connection troubleshooting steps on our support page to find possible solutions.
patcher_error_failed_to_write_content: A patch was unable to download to your hard drive. This error is usually caused by not having enough room on your disk for the download. Please ensure that your computer has at least 8 GB of free space on the drive where League is installed and that you have the necessary permissions to write to the drive. For more help with this error, see the troubleshooting steps here. Note: Clicking "Okay" will close the client.
patcher_error_missing_files_content: Something's up with our servers and it's preventing you from patching. We're giving it another shot. In the meantime, you can check the status of our servers here.
patcher_error_not_enough_disk_space_cont: League can't update because you don't have enough disk space. Please free up at least {{Bytes}} of space and try again.
patcher_error_unspecified_content: Patching failed and we're not sure why. Please restart the client to try patching again.
patcher_failed_to_write_error_content: Failed to write file to disk. Please check that you have enough free space and that you have the necessary permissions.
patcher_missing_files_error: Something's up with our servers, and it's preventing you from patching. We're giving it another shot. In the meantime, check the status of our servers here
patcher_modal_error_ticker_message_headi: These live incidents may have caused the error:
patcher_notification_did_restore_client_: We have restored this installation to an older version of League of Legends. Now we'll try to patch it up to the latest version.
patcher_repair_msg: Sorry! We've detected some possible data corruption in your installation. Would you like to repair the affected files?
patcher_restart_msg: An update has finished downloading. You must restart League of Legends before the update can be applied.
patcher_unspecified_error: Patching failed, but we're not sure why. Check our support page {{support page}} to find possible solutions.
patcher_will_restore_client_backup_on_re: There was a problem updating League of Legends. We'll restore a backup version of League and try again after you restart
postgame_reconnect_failed_game_ended: The game has ended. You will now be returned to the home page.
postgame_reconnect_message: You have left a game in progress. Please reconnect to the game.
postgame_scoreboard_harassment_sent: A report has been sent for review. Thank you.
postgame_scoreboard_no_more_kudos: You have used up all available kudos.
postgame_scorecard_harassment_submit_err: Could not report this player. Please try again later.
postgame_scorecard_kudos_submit_error: Could not give kudos to this player. Please try again later.
pregame_dodge_confirm: Are you sure you want to leave champion select?
pregame_dodge_message: A player has dodged the game; you have been returned to the lobby.
pregame_trade_error: The swap could not be requested. Please try again.
pregame_trade_waiting: Waiting for {{actor}} to respond to your swap request...
ready_check_champ_select_dodge_party_not: {{summonerName}} left during champion selection. You have been returned to the lobby.
ready_check_champ_select_dodge_stranger_: A player has left during champion selection. You have been returned to the queue.
settings_blocklist_select_summoners_to_u: Select the players to unblock, then hit save.
settings_main_confirm_text: Are you sure you want to reset all of your options to the default settings?
settings_repair_description: If there is something wrong with League of Legends, click the repair button below to fix it! Warning: this will take a long time.
settings_repair_dialog_confirm_message: Do you really want to repair? It will take a long time!
summoner_icon_change_save_error: Unable to save. Please try again later
summoner_spell_spell_Barrier_description: Shields your champion for 115-455 (depending on champion level) for 2 seconds.
summoner_spell_spell_Clairvoyance_descri: Reveals a small area of the map for your team for 5 seconds.
summoner_spell_spell_Clarity_description: Restores 40% of your champion's maximum Mana. Also restores allies for 40% of their maximum Mana.
summoner_spell_spell_Cleanse_description: Removes all disables and summoner spell debuffs affecting your champion and lowers the duration of incoming disables by 65% for 3 seconds.
summoner_spell_spell_Exhaust_description: Exhausts target enemy champion, reducing their Movement Speed and Attack Speed by 30%, their Armor and Magic Resist by 10, and their damage dealt by 40% for 2.5 seconds.
summoner_spell_spell_Flash_description: Teleports your champion a short distance toward your cursor's location.
summoner_spell_spell_Garrison_descriptio: Allied Turret: Grants massive regeneration for 8 seconds. Enemy Turret: Reduces damage dealt by 80% for 8 seconds.
summoner_spell_spell_Ghost_description: Your champion can move through units and has 27% increased Movement Speed for 10 seconds.
summoner_spell_spell_Heal_description: Restores 90-345 Health (depending on champion level) and grants 30% Movement Speed for 1 second to you and target allied champion. This healing is halved for units recently affected by Summoner Heal.
summoner_spell_spell_Ignite_description: Ignites target enemy champion, dealing 70-410 true damage (depending on champion level) over 5 seconds, grants you vision of the target, and reduces healing effects on them for the duration.
summoner_spell_spell_Mark_description: Throw a snowball in a straight line at your enemies. If it hits an enemy, they become marked and your champion can quickly travel to the marked target as a follow up.
summoner_spell_spell_Poro Toss_descripti: Throw a Poro at your enemies. If it hits, you can quickly travel to your target as a follow up.
summoner_spell_spell_Revive_description: Instantly revives your champion at your team's Summoner Platform and increases their Movement Speed for a short duration.
summoner_spell_spell_Smite_description: Deals 390-1000 true damage (depending on champion level) to target epic or large monster or enemy minion.
summoner_spell_spell_Teleport_descriptio: After channeling for 3.5 seconds, teleports your champion to target allied structure, minion, or ward.
summoner_spell_spell_To the King!_descri: Quickly travel to the Poro King's side.
multi_purchase_slider_error_not_multiple: You can only buy mutliples of {{minQuantity}}
toast_april_fools_pengu_garen_dialog_1: Happy April Fools', merrymaker! Let us celebrate!
toast_april_fools_pengu_garen_dialog_2: The April Fools' Army needs reinforcement, and you are the perfect soldier of silliness!
toast_april_fools_pengu_garen_dialog_3: To battle! My pengu-licious party favors are yours to wield against the forces of mayhem.
toast_april_fools_pengu_garen_dialog_gam: Find me in unranked SR, ARAM, and Co-Op vs. AI. We ride at dawn!
toast_april_fools_cat_shaco_dialog_1: Purr... ("Won't you play? I have many April Fools' surprises fur you...")
toast_april_fools_cat_shaco_dialog_2: Meow! ("Nyah-hah! Cat-ch me if you can!")
toast_april_fools_cat_shaco_dialog_3: Mrrow! ("Mayhem is my domain! A cat-astrophe awaits!")
